title: DVD release date change, NYC run still going, more screenings
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 31.Oct.2007 12.20pm 

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456im_/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/images/newsletter.header.gif)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/)  
  
  
  
  
1. DVD release date changed  
2. New York run extended (this is the final week, really!)  
3. Screenings this week in Estonia, England, Denmark, Belgium, Georgia, more  
  
  
  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456im_/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/images/swedishlovehate.jpg)  
_Souvenirs from Monday's event in Stockholm_

**DVD RELEASE DATE CHANGED TO 11/20**  
Due to some unavoidable manufacturing delays, the release date of the retail DVD of _Helvetica_ has been pushed back two weeks to November 20th. The DVD will not be available in stores worldwide until that date. If you've pre-ordered the DVD from our site (or the limited-edition box set) your copy will be shipped one week prior to the new date. Institutional DVD orders are not affected. Our apologies on this, sorry for any inconvenience.  
  
  
  
  
**NEW YORK RUN EXTENDED... BUT THIS IS IT!**  
  
  
  
_Helvetica_ has been extended for an 8th week at the [IFC Center](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.ifccenter.com/) in Greenwich Village. But we've been assured this will be the last week... we have to give those other films a chance, after all. So if any of you New Yorkers have been procrastinating, [this is it](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.ifccenter.com/). Presented, of course, by our friends at [Plexifilm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.plexifilm.com/), [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.veer.com/), and [A Public Space](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.apublicspace.org/).  
  
  
  
  
**SCREENINGS THIS WEEK IN ESTONIA, ENGLAND, DENMARK, BELGIUM, GEORGIA...**  
  
  
  
October 31 & November 1  
 [Kumu](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.ekm.ee/kumu.php), Tallinn, Estonia  
Part of the Swiss Design Festival. Q&A with Gary Hustwit after the October 31st show.  
  
  
  
November 2 - 15  
 [Institute of Contemporary Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.ica.org.uk/), London, England  
  
An encore run at the ICA!

November 7 - 11  
 [Sheffield Doc/Fest](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/https:/sheffdocfest.com/), Sheffield, England

November 8  
 [AIGA Atlanta Screening](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.aiga-atl.org/), Atlanta GA, USA  
 Woodruff Arts Center. Q&A with Gary Hustwit and Matthew Carter

November 8 & 9  
 [MuKHA](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.muhka.be/toont_film_kalender.php), Antwerp, Belgium

November 9 - 15  
 [Athens Arthaus Cine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.athenscine.com/), Athens GA, USA

November 9 - 18  
 [CPH:DOX Festival](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105130456/http:/www.cphdox.dk/d1/fa.lasso?e=1), Copenhagen, Denmark  
  
  
  
  
Cheers!
author: paul d hunt
